name: Onyxia
rules: Onyxia has +1 ATK while attacking.; 10, Flip Onyxia -> Destroy target opposing hero.

name: Onyxia
rules: Long-Range.; Onyxia has +2 ATK while attacking.; 2, Flip Onyxia -> Put a Whelp into play for each resource you have. Use only on your turn.

name: Onyxia
rules: Onyxia has +3 ATK while attacking.; 20, Flip Onyxia -> Destroy all opposing heroes.

name: Another Lesson
rules: When Onyxia deals combat damage to an ally this turn, ready Onyxia.
flavour: It seems you need another lesson, mortals.

name: Bellowing Roar
rules: Stage 3 Only.; Put all opposing allies into their owner's hands. Opponents can't play allies until after your next turn.
flavour: The lair itself shuddered at the awful sound.

name: Brood of Onyxia
rules: Stage 2 Only.; Put ten Whelps into play.
flavour: Whelps! Many whelps! Now! Handle it!

name: Burninate
rules: Destroy all opposing abilities, allies, and equipment.
flavour: Suddenly the lair was aflame, everything burning like thatched-roof cottages.

name: Crush
rules: Destroy target ally.
flavour: Puny mortalsâ€¦

name: Deep Breath
rules: Stage 2 Only.; Onyxia deals X fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. Deep Breath can't be interrupted.
flavour: There was a sharp intake of breath from above, and then fire - nothing but fire all around.

name: Devour
rules: If Onyxia is defending, she deals 5 melee damage to target attacking hero or ally.

name: Draconic Might
rules: Onyxia has +X ATK while attacking this turn, where X is the number of opposing heroes.
flavour: Excellent. You all should make a fine snack.

name: Draconic Rage
rules: Ongoing: Onyxia has +X ATK while attacking, where X is the current stage.
flavour: You dare challenge the daughter of Deathwing?

name: Dragon Hide
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to Onyxia this turn.
flavour: Your flesh tears much more easily than mine.

name: Engulfing Flames
rules: Attach to target opposing hero or ally, and Onyxia deals 5 damage to it.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, Onyxia deals X fire damage to attached character, where X is the current stage.
flavour: Those who survive the initial blast are far from safe.

name: Flame Breath
rules: Onyxia deals X fire damage to each opposing hero and ally, where X is the current stage.
flavour: It's when she stops talking that you have to worry. - Gorebelly

name: Foolish Mortals!
rules: Ongoing: Destroy Foolish Mortals! -> Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to Onyxia this turn.
flavour: You would sooner be a dragon snack than a dragonslayer.

name: Head Slam
rules: As an additional cost to play Head Slam, put up to 5 damage on Onyxia. Onyxia deals that amount of melee damage to each opposing ally.

name: Home Lair Advantage
rules: This turn, Onyxia can't be targeted by opponents, and your cards can't be interrupted.
flavour: Fools! You think you can defeat me in my lair?

name: How Fortuitous!
rules: Draw a card for each opposing hero.

name: Knock Away
rules: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Onyxia this turn.
flavour: As he flew, Igvand wondered whether I was bad that he was about to collide with the cavern wall or good that he would be beyond the reach of the dragon's fire.

name: Lava Cracks
rules: Stage 3 Only.; Choose an opposing hero or ally and roll a die. Onyxia deals that amount of fire damage to it. Repeat this process for each other opposing character.
flavour: Madness, terror, and falling rubble; flames burn and lava bubbles.

name: Learn Your Place, Mortal!
rules: Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size.

name: Meaningless Exertion
rules: Choose one: Destroy target ability; or interrupt target ability card.
flavour: This meaningless exertion bores me. I'll incinerate you all from above.

name: Roasted Flesh
rules: Ongoing: Destroy Roasted Flesh -> Onyxia deals 3 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally.

name: Shattering Scales
rules: Destroy all opposing abilites and equipment.

name: Tail Swipe
rules: Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.
flavour: Would-be dragonslayers quickly learn to avoid the tail.

name: Thrash
rules: Ongoing: Destroy Thrash -> Ready Onyxia.

name: Tooth and Claw
rules: Ongoing: Onyxia has +5 ATK while attacking.
flavour: Uh-oh, Ta'zo said, I tink we made her mad.

name: Tossed into the Hatchery
rules: Put a whelp into play for each opposing ally.

name: Trample
rules: Ongoing: Onyxia has +2 ATK while attacking. When Onyxia attacks, you may exhaust target ally.

name: The Whelp Pits
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if it's stage 2, roll a die and put that many Whelps into play.; Destroy The Whelp Pits -> Roll a die and put that many Whelps into play.

name: Wing Buffet
rules: Exhaust all opposing allies. They can't ready during their controllers' next ready step.
flavour: Despite his strength, Gorebelly could not rise against the windstorm that pinned him to the cavern floor.

name: Wrath of Onyxia
rules: Destroy all opposing allies.
flavour: In truth, dragons do not seek out gold for their lairs. They simply horde what treasures remain from those they destroy.

name: Battle Plan
rules: Each opponent draw a card.

name: Blunder into the Eggs
rules: Put a Whelp into play for each opposing hero. Those Whelps have ferocity this turn.

name: Break in the Action
rules: Each player draws a card.

name: Broken Ranks
rules: You may put up to X target allies into their owner's hands, where X is the current stage.

name: Burn to a Crisp
rules: Onyxia deals 1 fire damage to target opposing ally for each resource you have.

name: Charred Bones
rules: Shuffle any number of target graveyards into their owners' decks.

name: Chink in Her Armor
rules: Opponents may destroy target ability of their choice.

name: Claw, Claw, Bite
rules: Onyxia deals 1 melee damage to each hero and ally in target player's party.

name: Down the Gullet
rules: You may destroy target ally.

name: Dragonslayers
rules: Opposing allies have ferocity until your next turn.

name: Feeding Time
rules: Put X Whelps into play, where X is the current stage.

name: Fickle Fate
rules: Play another event after this one. (Both go into your resource row.)

name: Fuel for the fire
rules: Draw a card for each opposing hero.

name: Growing Rage
rules: Draw X cards, where X is the current stage.

name: He Who Hesitates...
rules: Opponents exhaust all of their resources.

name: Hidden Reserves
rules: Each opponent reveals the top two cards of his deck. He may put a revealed ally card into his hand and the rest on the bottom of his deck.

name: The High Cost of Dragonslaying
rules: You may destroy target equipment.

name: Imposing Presence
rules: Put the top X cards of the event deck into your resource row face down, where X is the current stage.

name: Lead from the Front
rules: Opposing heroes have protector this turn.

name: Lesser of Two Evils
rules: Reveal the top two cards of the Onyxia raid deck. Opponents choose one. Put that card into your hand and the other one on the bottom of your deck.

name: Play With Your Food
rules: Roll as many dice as the number of opposing heroes. Then, choose one die for each hero, and Onyxia deals that amount of melee damage to that hero.

name: Quicken the Pace
rules: Put the top card of the event deck into your resource row face down. Each opponent puts the top card of his deck into his resource row face down.

name: Reign of Fire
rules: Onyxia deals X fire damage to each opposing ally, where X is the current stage.

name: Sacrificial Meal
rules: Each opponent destroys one of his abilites, allies, or equipment.

name: Searing Flames
rules: You may destroy target ability.

name: Second Wind
rules: Each player draws cards until he reaches his maximum hand size.

name: Seize the Moment
rules: Opponents choose a player. That player readies all of his cards.

name: Smoke and Ash
rules: You may destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.

name: Take Cover
rules: Opponents choose a player. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to heroes and allies in that player's party this turn.

name: Wing Storm
rules: Exhaust all opposing allies.
